steps.title: Draw a perfect circle.
steps.content: Draw a perfect circle. You can use a protractor or a compass to guide you in drawing a perfect circle. Sketch a circle using a pencil first, and then trace the line using a marker.

steps.title: Begin with a sketch of a perfect circle outline.
steps.content: Begin with a sketch of a perfect circle outline. Use your pencil to lightly sketch a perfect circle.

steps.title: Add lines to show the actual shape of the ball.
steps.content: Add lines to show the actual shape of the ball. You can show a sphere by adding the perspective.

steps.title: Start coloring the draft.
steps.content: Start coloring the draft. Choose the basic color in beginning the coloring.

steps.title: Continue coloring.
steps.content: Continue coloring. Choose a color that is lighter than the basic color. Put it where the brighter areas should be shown which means that is where the light is being reflected.

steps.title: Add the darker shades.
steps.content: Add the darker shades. To show a more realistic approach to the drawing, add the shades and shadow. This way, the basketball will appear like a sphere.

steps.title: Draw four lines on the ball.
steps.content: Draw four lines on the ball. Two lines which are a vertical and a horizontal line in the middle simply follow the shape of the ball. The other two lines are curved lines conforming to the shape of the ball.
